Wed, 06 Nov 2024 02:35:27 +0000 Sione Tupoumalohi has been in and out of prison since age 13, a High Court judge was told as his existing sentence was lengthen by six years to reflect four stabbings while in prison.

US election: Kamala Harris’ embarrassing ‘fake’ phone call gaffe at Election Day event https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/us-election-kamala-harris-embarrassing-fake-phone-call-gaffe-at-election-day-event/O576TD2QK5EXNIH7ZFKPYWBCXY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/us-election-kamala-harris-embarrassing-fake-phone-call-gaffe-at-election-day-event/O576TD2QK5EXNIH7ZFKPYWBCXY/ Was the call staged, like Trump's McDonald's drive-through stunt?Wed, 06 Nov 2024 01:57:13 +0000 Kamala Harris drops by a phone bank event at the Democratic National Committee headquarters on Election Day.
